title: Judge Ken Starr on Report That Schiff Got Early Account of Whistle-Blower’s Accusations: This is “Relevant” and “Quite Troubling”
text:
Democratic presidential candidates, lawmakers ramp up calls for impeachment; Guy gets reaction from former Whitewater independent counsel Ken Starr on the heels of the breaking news that a spokesman for House Intelligence Committee Chairman Adam Schiff, D-Calif., acknowledged Wednesday that the whistleblower alleging misconduct in the White House had reached out to Schiff's panel before filing a complaint -- prompting President Trump, in an extraordinary afternoon news conference at the White House, to accuse Schiff directly of helping write the document.

Watch Below:
